I was able to develop a combination of pipe and cable, by doing further researches with them. To implement this I have added Neon conductors in the aluminum frame of the pipes. So I created an Item pipe that’s able to transport neon energy.

Configuration: Using the Scrench I'm able to configure every side of a pipe segment, so I can prevent them from connecting with this side. (§lright click§r on desired side). Furthermore this pipes have a third state, marked by a blue dot on the side. In this state it's only connected for neon energy, but not for Items.
